mapper.select: SELECT * FROM sys_dict WHERE del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} ORDER BY type, sort, update_date DESC
SELECT type FROM sys_dict WHERE del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} GROUP BY type ORDER BY type
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_dict( logid, value, label, type, description, sort, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{logid}, #{value}, #{label}, #{type}, #{description}, #{sort}, #{createBy.logid}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.logid}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_dict SET value = #{value}, label = #{label}, type = #{type}, description = #{description}, sort = #{sort}, update_by = #{updateBy.logid}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE logid = #{logid}
